forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In downtown San Francisco this morning, the air is still crisp from the coolness of the night, with a gentle whisper of a west-southwest breeze stirring above the streets. The forecast predicts a cheerful day ahead, one where the sun will stretch its golden arms to embrace the landscape, nudging the temperature to a pleasant 66 degrees before dipping softly in the afternoon. As the city shakes off its slumber, a thin layer of fog lingers along the horizon, hinting at a shy morning that will gradually give way to clarity.

With the cityscape basking under the sun later on, the atmosphere will be decidedly bright without the heavy cloak of fog. It would be wise to slip into layers, perhaps a light sweater over a t-shirt, allowing you to comfortably navigate the day's ebb and flow. With the weather calling for sunshine and gentle winds, an invigorating stroll through the Embarcadero could yield moments of contemplation amidst the rhythmic motion of the world around you, or perhaps a cozy café visit to savor a warm drink while watching the vibrant life of the city unfold.
